snippet.title: Salt and Sanctuary Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Salt and Sanctuary, Ska Studios’ brutal hand-drawn 2D Soulslike platformer, comes to Nintendo Switch August 2 with the help of porting specialist BlitWorks.

localized.title: Salt and Sanctuary Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
localized.description: Salt and Sanctuary, Ska Studios’ brutal hand-drawn 2D Soulslike platformer, comes to Nintendo Switch August 2 with the help of porting specialist BlitWorks.
